landing.title: TerraRisk
landing.subtitle: Workshop SEMIL-USP 2026
landing.description: Explore the Governance - Biodiversity - Climate - Health nexus
landing.welcomeDesc: Create a new group or join an existing one to get started
landing.initialCredits: Your group will start with {credits} credits to unlock layers
landing.noGroups: No groups created yet. Be the first to create one!
landing.errorNameRequired: Please enter a name for your group
landing.errorCreateGroup: Error creating group. Please try again.

layers.title: Available Layers
layers.selectLayers: Select layers from the panel above to visualize them on the map

purchase.title: Unlock Layer
purchase.confirm: Do you want to unlock {layer} for {cost} credits?

municipality.title: Municipality
municipality.clickToSelect: Click on a municipality on the map to view its data

strategy.title: Your Progress
strategy.tipText: Combine layers from different categories to generate bivariate maps and discover relationships between variables.

layerDescriptions.governance_climatic: UAI index of adaptive capacity to climate change
layerDescriptions.governance_general: General UAI index of institutional capacity
layerDescriptions.biodiversity: Biodiversity index based on species richness
layerDescriptions.rural: Percentage of population in rural areas

workshopFlow.phase1Desc: Based on the basic information, rank these 10 municipalities by priority (most urgent first)
workshopFlow.phase2Desc: Use your credits to unlock data layers and explore the map
workshopFlow.phase3Desc: With new information, revise your ranking and select priority actions
workshopFlow.phase4Desc: Compare your decisions with the data-driven analysis
workshopFlow.rankMunicipalities: Click municipalities to rank them by priority
workshopFlow.noRankingYet: Click on municipalities to start ranking
workshopFlow.vulnerabilityInterpretation: Actions with high disparity should be prioritized for high-vulnerability municipalities to reduce inequity. Red bars show benefit for high-vulnerability group, green bars for low-vulnerability group.

radarChart.noData: Select a municipality to see its risk profile

bipartiteNetwork.title: PEARC Action-Risk Network
bipartiteNetwork.description: Hover over nodes to explore connections. Click actions to select/deselect them.

actionDescriptions.reforestation: Restore degraded areas with native vegetation to recover ecosystem services
actionDescriptions.urban_drainage: Improve urban drainage systems to reduce flooding and waterborne diseases
actionDescriptions.vector_surveillance: Strengthen surveillance and control of disease-carrying vectors
actionDescriptions.water_management: Sustainable management of water resources to reduce hydric stress
actionDescriptions.protected_areas: Expand and connect protected areas to conserve biodiversity
actionDescriptions.climate_agriculture: Promote agricultural practices adapted to climate change
actionDescriptions.community_health: Strengthen community-based health programs and prevention
actionDescriptions.green_infrastructure: Implement green infrastructure in urban areas for climate resilience
actionDescriptions.environmental_monitoring: Establish monitoring networks for early warning of environmental risks
actionDescriptions.land_use_zoning: Implement land use policies that protect natural areas and reduce risk
actionDescriptions.social_protection: Strengthen social safety nets to reduce vulnerability
actionDescriptions.emergency_response: Build capacity for emergency response to climate disasters
actionDescriptions.biodiversity_corridors: Create ecological corridors connecting habitat fragments
actionDescriptions.pollution_control: Implement pollution control measures to improve air and water quality
actionDescriptions.climate_education: Promote climate literacy and awareness for better governance
